document.full_text: modern humans may have evolved in southern africa, not eastern africa as previous research had indicated. a study of genetic markers from six hunter-gatherer groups there found that they have the highest levels of genetic diversity in the world.
document.title: all humans are south african
lines_and_colors: modern humans may have evolved in southern africa, not eastern africa as previous research had indicated. a study of genetic markers from six hunter-gatherer groups there found that they have the highest levels of genetic diversity in the world.
